import React, { Component } from "react"; import "./App3.css"; class Card1 extends Component{ constructor(){ super(); this.state = { hobbies:[] } this.handleInputChange = this.handleInputChange.bind(this); } handleInputChange(event) { const target = event.target; var value = target.value; if(target.checked){ this.state.hobbies[value] = value; }else{ this.state.hobbies.splice(value, 1); } } submit(){ console.warn(this.state) } render(){ return( <>



  • {/*

    • Portugal

      • Aasiya Jayavant
    • Luvleen Lawrence
    • Rey Mibourne
    • Cayla Brister

    • Xenie Dolezelova
    • Ezequiel Dengra

) } } export default Card1;
